name: Android Applications Programmer
overview:
Android Application Development

Android Application Development

In 2007 Google and the Open Handset Alliance has introduced Android operating system for the hand held devices. Android is linux based open source operating system which has JAVA library developed by Google. Android development platform is specially has been introduced for the gearing up to take the experience of mobile devices with touch screen and the multimedia video effect support. Android app development is the unique and ultimate platform to experience with smart-phones and other gadget as well.

Android application development provides the ultimate platform for the marvelous experience with rich features and the phone with android offers phones with very flexible touch screen and the combination makes the experience enormously magnificent. Android provides the ultimate platform with which one can develop innovative mobile application to make your business function well.

Android development services

* Andriod app development
* Andriod game development
* Android live wallpaper development
* Android widget development
* Mobile business software creation
* Android library development
* App development with Bluetooth, Wi-Fi & GPS support
* Web-based applications development for mobile devices
* Multimedia mobile solutions
* Communication mobile application development
* Utility apps design and implementation
* Android Testing & QA services
* Social Networking application & solutions
